programme.desc: Caillous class pet - Gerald the Hamster - passes away the night before Caillou is due to take him home for the weekend.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Rosie is scared to go to the dentist for the first time, so Caillou tries to prove its not as scary as it seems!

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When railway inspectors come to the Island of Sodor, they start their inspection on Thomas’ branch line. Thomas, Annie and Clarabel are keen to show what they can do, but there are nothing but problems: a stuck window in a hot carriage, naughty schoolchildren pulling the emergency cable and animals on the line! To make matters worse one of the inspectors is very grumpy. But when Annie discovers that he’s left his gold watch on her seat, Thomas sets out to return it and that finally impresses the grumpy inspector more than anything.

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: Piper sneaks out of the depot before she is ready and finds out the hard way that she has a lot to learn.

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: Dunbar is leaving Chuggington for a while and so the trainees have a new teacher - Skylar. Brewster is not happy and doesn’t think anyone else can fill Dunbar’s wheels.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: It will soon be Mother’s Day and Shelley has decided to undertake an ambitious project with the class… which must remain a secret! But secrets are hard to keep when Charley’s mom accidentally finds clues or peeks into Charley’s classroom! The question is: has she guessed what her surprise present is?

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave climb to the top of a mountain to plant Tweet’s special flag. A mountain song that describes their actions, as they squeeze under a tree, around a muddy puddle and march over a bridge on the way there, helps them remember the way back home.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi is feeling a bit grumpy. He’s even refusing to play with Nina: our little hero is missing his grandparents and friends back home. But Mom reassures him: it’s normal to sometimes feel a little down when you’re away your loved - ones. To cheer him up, Dad suggests they make changes to the cottage, to remind him of his house back home, and his family! Tchoupi suddenly switches from feeling sad to feeling ecstatic! He’s eager to invite Nina to celebrate this happy day with him… but can’t find her anywhere! This gets him worrying: what if his friend took off because of how unkind he was to her this morning?

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A yellow-eyed penguin wanders into Hero’s kennel. The Junior Rangers head to New Zealand to find the penguin’s home, but can they prevent tourists from disturbing yellow-eyed penguins on the beach?

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The green Grub wants to stay with Dolly for the winter, but always finds her at the wrong time with the request. The Wind accidentally blows the The Green Grub to the seaside, then brings it back to Dolly. Finally, Dolly happily welcomes the Green Grub for the winter and prepares a comfortable bed for him.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly 05 Mepe
programme.desc: Berry the snail and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They have many adventures, while they make new friends and get knowledge about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the forest hold a baking contest to celebrate the arrival of summer, but Dr Owl goes overboard with tasting. With the help of Beetle Bodobács, they manage to save the evening with chimney cakes and dancing. The next day, Dr Owl apologizes and improves his mood with a group workout.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On a rainy day, Dollys house gets flooded. When the rain stops, Stanley, the stag beetle, repairs the roof. Berry also helps Dolly, who is upset about her soaked drawings. Berry visits Raymond, the copper beetle, who has plenty of bells. He asks for two special bells to cheer Dolly up. At home, he makes coconut balls and later delivers them to Dolly along with the bells, which make her very happy. Later, Berry paints over the stain caused by the rain, and Dolly repaints the pictures with the help of Flutter and Leapy. The bells bring joy to the house.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Flutter, the butterfly girl, catches a cold on a gloomy, rainy day. Doctor Owl examines her and advises her to rest a lot in bed. Her friends visit often to take care of her, and Flutter always asks them to read from her new book. Soon, everyone knows the story, which tells of a ball held in a splendid castle. One day, Balthazar makes Flutter sad by saying that the princess story is just a fairy tale. Flutter turns away, disappointed, and falls asleep. Balthazar meets Doctor Owl, who notices that something is bothering him.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends put on a show in the park. After Coco’s dance, Pando’s song and Sula’s acrobatics display everyone is excited to see Bing’s finale. When he gets up on the stage Bing is overcome with stage fright so his friends, and rainbow fairy mice, come to the rescue.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing tries to show Sula she doesnt need to wear earmuffs to watch the fireworks but when a loud bang sends Bing flying, he doesnt think they are such a bad idea!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is sad when his new orange balloon pops so Flop helps him make a Bye Bye Box, a memory box for broken toys too special to throw away.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Pando play on the swings together but when Pando takes longer than his turn, Bing gets angry and runs infront of the swings and gets bumped.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is building a tower of blocks when Coco takes some to make a rainbow. When Charlie wants to play with the blocks too, they decide to make a new game they can all play.

programme.title: Bing Bunny - Shorts and characters
programme.desc: Get to know our little pets better through charming stories featuring the characters from the popular Bing series.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon and his little brother Gaspard are going to take the plane to go visit Grandpa and Grandma. And for the very first time, without their parents! Gaspard is a bit scared but Simon is there to reassure him and the nice stewardess takes wonderful care of them. During the trip they are going to be in for lots of surprises: they get to visit the cockpit, experience take-off, get a great tray of food, have magical views out the window…and even the turbulence is cool! When the plane lands, Grandma and Grandpa are there to greet them and Simon and Gaspard are more than ready for their next trip up in the sky!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: As the family are gathering in food for the winter, Berry becomes ill and is the focus of her parent’s attention. Her brothers and sisters, who would rather laze around instead of sorting redcurrants or nuts, notice this. Now, one after the other, they all fall ill… with much playacting. Edmund and Margaret are not fooled and come up with a response as they have every intention of having a relaxed moment tasting some nice, fresh redcurrant juice…

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse discover creatures that can blend in with their surroundings and are inspired to learn just where they can blend in. Little Nutbrown hare becomes disappointed when his white fluffy tail and his dark brown ear tips give him away each time. That’s until he discovers the reeds by the river are exactly the right height and colours to camouflage him perfectly.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Big Nutbrown Hare has a lot to do today. Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse promise to help but there are so many wonderful distractions they forget their promise and let Big Nutbrown Hare down. Luckily they learn a valuable lesson from some bees and get busy to make to things right!

programme.title: Boribon
programme.desc: Boribon receives seven balloons of different colours as a gift from Annalee. However, soon all of them disappear, and Boribon is left with none. Boribon feels sad. In the end, although the balloons are gone, the seven colours shine in the rainbow.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: In the courtyard, Sam and Julia have discovered that snowflakes are formed by beautiful little stars. But how can they preserve these wonders and show them to Julias mom before it melt?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia have adopted a pumpkin theyve nicknamed Leo. But Sams dad is planning to make with it a delicious soup for the whole building. The two friends try anything they can to save him.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The wind is blowing on the beach while the Triplets are really excited at the thought of trying their brand new kite. But because of the wind "ziouuuff" the three sun hats fly away and go into the sea. The children don’t know what to do and look for a way to get their hats back. But by the way, where are going all the items which fly away?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The boys and Kiko are making a football field to play on the beach, all they need is a fourth player to make two teams. They ask Girl who was picking up shells on the beach. She happily accepts their offer but once the field’s ready, and with no explication at all, Girl starts sulking on her towel and refuse to talk to the boys. Nothing will make her stop, not pulling faces, not Mommies’ hugs, not even candies! What could have possibly happen?

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Wilson takes a test to assess his new Chug Patrol skills, but he forgets something important and fails. Later when a real emergency arises, Wilson handles the situation perfectly and gets Old Puffer Pete out of trouble. Jackman is impressed – maybe Wilson will even make chief one day.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy tries to earn her ‘Pioneers Yoga Teaching Badge’ by teaching the rest of the Pioneers the "Upward Octopus" sequence. But constant interruptions test her patience and she ends up stuck on a cliff ledge!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: A Go-Kart Challenge goes topsy-turvy when Peters Go-Kart catches fire and sets ablaze everything in its path!

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Mouse wants Kipper to push her along on a roller skate. He’s got a better idea. Why don’t they play Hide and Seek? She doesn’t know what it is so Kipper explains that she covers her eyes and counts to ten while someone hides. Mouse hides first but when it’s her turn to count she confesses to Kipper that she can’t count past five. Kipper says he’ll teach her and he does his best but in the end it’s easier to count to five TWICE. But by the end of the game Mouse counts all the way to ten – AND finds Kipper.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Tiger decides to invite everyone to a fancy dress party. Kipper, Pig and Jake dont know what Tigers going to be dressed as - but the invitation says no one is to come as a pirate!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou feels frustrated when Rosie solves all the scavenger hunt clues at Grandma and Grandpa’s beach house. In fantasy, Caillou pretends to be a pirate captain on a sinking ship who learns the importance of listening to his team.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou doesn’t like Daddy’s chicken dinner, and he says so with a “Yuck!” Going into fantasy, Caillou pretends to be the Silver Knight, cooking a meal for a very picky King (Daddy), and the experience teaches him to express his dislike for something in a more polite way.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas befriends a stray dog who is wandering around the railway and tries to find him a home. In the process, Thomas derails and the fuzzy little dog raises the alarm.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a relaxing trip to the hot spring turns into a disaster when the mischievous Japanese Macaques steal the Junior Rangers gadgets.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In this episode, the Junior Rangers attempt to return a crab-eating macaque to the wild. Their knowledgeable friend, Ranger Rocky, assists them in their journey through the rainforest.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pats delivering new rollers to the car wash but a broken catch on the van leads to chaos.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The kids and Lauren have gone on a camping trip, but they have forgotten the tent.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to try Coco’s Hula Hoop. It’s harder than it looks but he finds lots of other hoopy games as he tries. Just as Bing almost gets it right he gets carried away with spinning, trips over and breaks the hoop. Coco is upset that she can’t hula anymore until Bing and Charlie remind her of all the other games they can still do with the bent hoop.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are in the park playing at being giants and splashing in puddles with their big welly boots. As they play the puddles get bigger and bigger until Bing slips over in the mud and gets wet everywhere. Amma comes to the rescue with a giant warm bath and a giant carroty bagel.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Flop teaches Bing and Pando how to blow bubbles. Bing finally blows a big bubble but gets upset when Pando pops it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula head off for a picnic at the paddling pool with Flop. But when they get there, they are shocked to find there is no water inside. Bing’s disappointment soon gives way to the realisation that it’s a very special pool day. With no water there are all sorts of games they can play that are usually against the pool rules.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: During Bing’s bedtime routine he inadvertently pees on his blankie and it’s too wet to wash and dry before bed. Fortunately his Hoppity Voosh toy has a cape just as soft and huggy as blankie and it even smells just right too.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswalds piano has one key thats way off-key, thanks to an unseen ladybird who crawls under the lid. Oswald decides to take the piano to Maestro Bingos Music Shop where it will be fixed. On the way, he encounters his friends in numerous predicaments - each time the piano comes in handy helping them out. At the Music Shop, Maestro Bingo prescribes several cures, but nothing works. Finally, the ladybird crawls out of the piano - problem solved!

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald and Daisy find a duckling who’s lost her mother. With the help of the Egg Twins, Madame Butterfly and Johnny Snowman, they search all over town, but can’t find her anywhere. Daisy grows fond of the duckling as it reaches out to her for comfort but, when they find its mother, she reluctantly accepts the duckling is back where she belongs.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are completing work on a brand new fitness trail in the sports stadium park. They must finish before the afternoon’s Spring City Fun Run - a steeplechase across the fitness trail obstacle course, organised by Scoop’s idol Skye Sampson, a fitness guru and world champion record-breaking athlete. When Scoop is told that only humans will be competing, he sets up his own competition: the Muscle Machine Games! With events including “Weightlifting” (with a pallet of wooden beams) and “Discuss Throw” (with an old tyre) Lofty and Muck both break new records...

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mayor Madison has arranged for Ballroom Blitz, TV dance sensation, to come on tour to Spring City. When star dancer, Sylvain de Souza, threatens to cancel the show unless he gets a sprung dance floor, Maria enlists Bob to save the day, in return for a show tango with her hero. Dance fever sweeps Team Bob and the Spring City Rockets but Lofty despairs of ever being able to dance as well as the others. Just as he finds his dancing mojo, Lofty accidentally wrecks part of the sprung dance floor. Sylvain recognizes a kindred spirit in Lofty and urges him to follow his dreams, no matter how unlikely they may seem.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare follows some unusual tracks in the snow that eventually lead him to a shy little spotty deer. He plays with his new friend every day, until she has to leave again with her mother to search for food. Little Nutbrown Hare is sad to see her go, but he’s also glad that he has friends that stay in the meadow all year round.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The snow in the meadow is so deep that Little Nutbrown Hare has to stay under the Old Oak tree. Wondering what he is going to do all day in deep snow and with no one to play with, his imagination soon takes over as he creates new kinds of fun. By the time his friends reach him, Little Nutbrown Hare can’t believe how the time has flown!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: On a cold but sunny morning in the middle of Winter, Little Nutbrown Hare discovers his friends ice-skating on the frozen pond. He decides to give it a try but slips, slops and slides all over the ice. Will he persevere for long enough to be able to perfect his own unique style, or will he be put off by the natural skill of his friends?

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: The class is having a picnic and everyone is happy. Especially Paxton! Learn about healthy snacks with Otus, Stripey and Yabba.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: When Huckle, Lowly and Sally find a lost bag, they use the eyeglass case, atomizer, map, and a red scarf inside it to determine that the owner is a famous international opera star who’s come to Busytown to perform for the first time./Cyclists getting flat tires somewhere in Busytown lead Huckle and the gang on a mystery.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is surrounded by his usual mess! Hopping about, he asks himself why fish live underwater, but birds live in trees? When you need to know go to Okido! Messy lands with a somersault onto his bottom and finds Felix and Zoe are painting their house. “Why?” asks Messy. “You have to take care of the place you live in Messy”, explains Zoe. And just at that moment an alarm goes off… It’s a Cloudship emergency!

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is trying to fly, and doesn’t understand why he can’t. So he jumps into the vortex to go to Okido and find out! When Messy bounces off the trampoline in Okido he flaps his little arms to turn the bounce into flying but he lands with a bump onto his bottom! Zoe and Felix laugh at him for trying to fly, and tell him to go with them to hear Mayor Oki’s AMAZING news. Messy loves anything amazing, so they skidoodle on down to Okido Park.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: At the girls campout, Sour launches into a whopper of a yarn about the adventures she and Sweet had in the "Berry Deep Dark Forest." She tries to get Sweet to participate in spinning the tale, but Sours over-the-top performance leaves Sweet behind. Toward the end, Sour graciously changes the story to pull Sweet into it, giving Sweet the opportunity to toss in an ad lib that makes a nice topper to Sours story. Sweet is thrilled when everyone applauds her, even Sour, who is impressed by her contribution and proud of her sister.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Harry is disappointed that none of his wishes come true in the real world, the dinosaurs take him to visit the wishing well.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry, Charlie, and the dinosaurs are playing at being pirates.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Who’s that hopping into the garden? Why, it’s a yellow-footed rock-wallaby—and its baby! The Junior Rangers hightail it to Australia to send mother and child home, but will a couple of flat tires throw a spanner in the works?

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: The Fat Controller sends Thomas to the docks to collect a very important Christmas parcel. Unfortunately Cranky drops it when he is unloading a ship and hearing the way the parcel rattles thinks it must be broken. He tries to hide it from Thomas so that nobody will find out what he’s done. But the Fat Controller does not give up so easily and neither does Thomas and with the help of Salty the parcel is soon discovered again. Thomas sets off to deliver it at last, but slips on the icy tracks, dislodging the parcel and thinks he must have broken it too. When the Fat Controller opens it the surprise turns out to be a surprise for Thomas and Cranky too!

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Kevin is very excited by the snow, but Victor doesn’t like it at all. He explains to Kevin that the snow is causing all sorts of trouble. Emily is stuck in the Steamworks, because the parts she is waiting for are on a truck that’s stuck in the snow at the depot. When Kevin goes outside some snow falls off the roof trapping him too. Victor thinks Kevin’s gone to try to fetch the truck from the depot and sets off to rescue his friend. Luckily Thomas has been sent to the depot too and is able to find Victor before anyone else gets stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu is entrusted with what seems to be an easy mission. It consists in moving a beehive in a field of honey flowers. But things get complicated when an accident occurs, and the beehive gets lost. Moreover, Grisu has to deal with Fume who has a sore throat and cannot spit fire. Grisu will finally succeed in getting the bee queen (and the other bees) into the beehive thanks to Miss Gertruds perfume. And Fume will be cured thanks to the honey!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Natureza is on the ice cap conducting a polar bear study. She still has one last bear to tag but its too fast. So she needs a snowmobile pilot to help her approach and tag the beast. Its a perfect mission for Grisu who is no snowmobile pilot, but can adapt to anything and is impervious to cold! As he lands on the polar cap, Grisu unwittingly wakes up the napping bear and is chased after by it. He gets out of his bind thanks to Natureza. As theyre getting ready to tag the bear, Grisu, unwittingly again, burns the snowmobile engine. The mission seems compromised, but a firefighter never gives up! Resourceful Grisu uses his wind-filled parachute to pull the snowmobile and thanks to him, Natureza ends up tagging the bear.

programme.title: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau : Dernières paroles
programme.desc: The great German baritone Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau was greatly admired for his interpretive insight, note-perfect control of the tonal qualities, and shadings of color in his voice, for exceptional rhythmic sense and impeccable diction. His reputation as a lieder singer is so high – he had a repertoire of more than 3.000 songs – that it is easy to forget his extensive list of operatic roles. In this conversation Fischer-Dieskau reveals for the last time on camera the secrets of his outstanding career. His ‘Last Words’ provide a deep insight into the extraordinary artistic life of one of the most famous and prolific lieder singers of our time. Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau died in May 2012 at the age of 86.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi avslojar episka byggmissar och undersoker konstruktionsfel i rymdfarjan Columbia, varfor fartyg kolliderar med broar i Kina, dålig hotelldesign, en tornkollaps i Shanghai och vardelosa flygplatser.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Margot ar mitt i vinterns djup och ger sig ut på jakt efter vardefulla palsdjur; Billy ar fast besluten att trivas i de kalla skogarna i norr och forsoker sig på att bygga ett uppvarmningssystem for varmvatten. Matty gor några rejala ”komfort”-uppgraderingar i sin nyligen utbyggda bostad på Newfoundland. Och nar Emilie och Gilbert tar en paus från stugbyggandet agnar de sig åt att sakra en traditionell och viktig matkalla.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Våren har kommit och Margot ger sig ut for att leta efter bjorn – men hamnar oga mot oga med en annu mer formidabel naturkraft. Billy drar nytta av det varmare vadret och påborjar arbetet med några valbehovliga uppgraderingar av stugan. Matty blir en riktig ”hillbilly” med sina planer på den ultimata frysboxen i skogen, och Emilie och Gilbert borjar arbeta på en ”Shabotwan” – en traditionell byggnad som de hoppas kunna fardigstalla innan vårens gåsjakt borjar.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: I detta avsnitt av Food Factory USA: Traffa barnbarnsbarnet till och lar dig destilleringshemligheterna bakom den legendariska bourbontillverkaren Jim Beam från Kentucky; TruMoo-chokladmjolk framstalls och blandas i ofantliga mangder; och mer an en miljon Tina’s-burritos handrullas varje dag – ole!

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: I detta avsnitt av Food Factory USA: Upptack hemligheten bakom en perfekt skål utsokta ramen-nudlar – på mindre an tre minuter; det kravs en ”blackfisk”, en ”giljotin” och en ”inlindare” for att skapa denna klassiska och utsokta amerikanska godbit; och varje limpa Challah-aggbrod flatas och bakas karleksfullt for hand.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: På ny mark
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay upptacker det isolerade Tasmanien soder om Australiens fastland. Har utforskar han ons ororda natur, dyker efter kraftor i hajrika vatten, undviker giftormar i bushen på jakt efter lokala orter, fiskar forell och samlar in unik honung. Sist moter han nomadkocken Analiese Gregory i en kockduell nar de forbereder en brakmiddag av episka proportioner.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Smugglare anvander blekmedel och falska golv for att gomma 350 kilo kokain, men Mayaguez Air and Marine agents upptacker gomstallet. På Amerikanska Jungfruoarna jagar myndigheterna misstankta smugglare som fångats på dolda kameror. På vastra sidan av Puerto Rico upptacker man skjutvapen ombord på två fartyg som misstanks smuggla narkotika från Dominikanska republiken.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Nya officerare påborjar en elitutbildning till stridspiloter, men endast ett fåtal kommer att klara utbildningen. De kampar med precisionsbombning och utsatts for hårda bedomningar av instruktorerna.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Att landa på ett hangarfartyg – en viktig fardighet for alla stridspiloter i den amerikanska flottan – kraver absolut precision. Nar eleverna står infor den langsta och mest kravande fasen av utbildningen vet de att detta test kommer att avgora deras framtid i cockpit. Under den okande pressen borjar vissa vackla, vilket leder till en skarp varning från befalhavaren.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord och Terje riskerar sina liv for att radda en lastbil som kort in i en snovall i fjallen. I norr stalls Jo Roger och Stig infor ett stort problem nar de forsoker radda en tankbil som fastnat.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord och Bjorn arbetar for att radda en lastbil som krossat ett vagracke. Jo Roger ger sig ut for att undsatta en lastbil som ar begravd i sno, men hans lastbil tappar greppet på den isiga vagen.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Svårt vintervader for med sig kaos till bergen, och Thord borjar få slut på alternativ. Hes undsatter en 50-tonnare an ytterligare akutsamtal kommer in. Bjoern gor Thord en stor tjanst, lamnar sitt territorium och tar farjan till kusten for att radda en snoplog. Uppe i norr tar Jo Roger sig an en frontlastare i 20 minusgrader som hamnat på sidan och blockerar huvudleden soderut.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Jo Roger och Ole Henrik kampar med ett slap med salt, Thord tar hand om en lastbil som balanserar på en klippkant och Örjan stalls infor stora problem nar han ska ta sig an en traktor med trasig axel.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjorn och Thord samarbetar for att radda en lastbil som glidit ner i diket. Senare forsoker Jo Roger radda en skordetroska, men tappar humoret nar otåliga forare utsatter hans besattning for fara.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: På vag till ett uppdrag hamnar Terje i problem efter att ha krockat med Thords bogserbil. I bergen soker Eirik efter en sopbil som hamnat på villospår. Bjoern beger sig ut for att undsatta en fyrtiotonnare som valt i ett snodike. Hans mannar måste grava sig djupt ner under slapet for att grava tunnlar åt bogserlinorna, men om snon kollapsar under lastbilens vikt kan de alla komma att krossas.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar ett slap på rymmen hotar en huvudled riskerar Thord att krossas i sitt forsok att undsatta den. Nykomlingen Terje vill garna visa att han ar ratt man for ett enkelt jobb som snabbt visar sig vara raka motsatsen. I norr forsoker Torstein och Isak undsatta en mejerilastbil som valt i ett dike, men djup nsno och dolda faror satter koppar i hjulet.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: På en brant sluttning, hogt over fjorden, riskerar Bjorn allt for att radda en traktor som hotar att falla – och ta honom med sig. Thord fastnar i leran efter att en lastbil sjunkit djupt ner i en bondes åker. Nar hans bargningsbil inte kan få grepp måste han tanka i nya banor. I norr gor sig Jo Roger redo att radda en valt containerlastbil, men nar en vajer glider befarar han en katastrof.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete ar en episodserie om striden under vattenytan och om de storsta ubåtarnas patrulluppdrag under kriget.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: April 1940: Tyska slagskepp infiltrerar norska fjordar i ett forsok att erovra viktiga hamnar och sakra Hitlers tillgång till jarnmalm. Men brittiska Royal Navy ar dem i halarna, vilket utloser en kamp om kontrollen over det neutrala Norge. Denna strid kraver banbrytande metoder for krigforing och mobiliserar motståndskampar medan hemliga kommandosoldater tavlar for att hindra nazisterna från att bygga den forsta atombomben.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Nya officerare påborjar en elitutbildning till stridspiloter, men endast ett fåtal kommer att klara utbildningen. De kampar med precisionsbombning och utsatts for hårda bedomningar av instruktorerna.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Att landa på ett hangarfartyg – en viktig fardighet for alla stridspiloter i den amerikanska flottan – kraver absolut precision. Nar eleverna står infor den langsta och mest kravande fasen av utbildningen vet de att detta test kommer att avgora deras framtid i cockpit. Under den okande pressen borjar vissa vackla, vilket leder till en skarp varning från befalhavaren.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett Transair-fraktplan med oljeutrustning flyger over Alperna vid kraftig turbulens nar det skakas av en explosion som sliter av båda motorer från hoger vinge. Besattningen får kampa for att styra sin stympade Boeing 707, men lyckas – trots att planet omsluts av eld – genomfora en dodsforaktande landning. Darefter ar det upp till utredarna att hitta den mikroskopiska men ack så dodliga orsaken.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi avslojar episka byggmissar och undersoker konstruktionsfel i rymdfarjan Columbia, varfor fartyg kolliderar med broar i Kina, dålig hotelldesign, en tornkollaps i Shanghai och vardelosa flygplatser.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Blixtar orsakar kaos i byggnader nar de slår ner. Över hela varlden sjunker stader av olika anledningar och torn kollapsar. En tunnelbanevagn i Mexico City och flera broar i Indien rasar. I Dallas blir en olycklig rivning en kopia av det lutande tornet i Pisa och en sensation på sociala medier. Vanliga manniskor visar upp sina MacGyver-fardigheter, vilket vacker frågan: geniala eller galna?

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget från ovan
programme.desc: WWII: Secrets From Above skildrar det andra varldskrigets mest hapnadsvackande handelser ur ett helt nytt perspektiv. Geno matt matcha fangslande bilder från fronten, sallan visade filmklipp och fantastiska flygrekognosceringsbilder och deras ursprungliga platser återskapar serien vitala slag, djarva bombrader och utvecklingen av varldens forsta massforstorelsevapen.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget från ovan
programme.desc: Året ar 1942. Hitler vill ha hamnd for de allierades obarmhartiga bombningar av tyska stader. I en hemlig forskningsanlaggning utvecklar hans forskare varldens forsta kryssnings- och ballistiska missiler. En katt- och råttalek med hoga insatser tar sin borjan, dar de allierade forsoker avsloja nazisternas hemligheter från luften. Kan de stoppa Hitler innan han får sin hamnd?

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Stora barriarrevet ar ett tropiskt paradis, men det har aven en mork sida. Arkeologer forsoker losa gåtan med Australiens egna "Titanic". Med hjalp av en fjarrstyrd undervattensfarkost tar vi oss ner till havsbottnen dar vi ser spår av revets våldsamma tillkomst och utveckling. Ett forlist brittiskt krigsfartyg från mitten av 1700-talet lankar revet till det okanda myteriet på Bounty.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz åker till Cambridge for att fixa till en alskad Range Rover Vouge SE från 1991, en pålitlig fyrhjulsdriven bil som sett sina basta dagar och nu behover lite extra karlek. Del 6:10.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: En BMW 2002 Turbo behover hjalp, men det ar uppenbart att den legendariska bilen kan bli snappet for svår att rusta upp.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Nar en hemlig sovjetisk ubåt med karnvapenbestyckade torpeder upptacks vara på vag mot Kuba attackeras den med "sjunkbomber for ovning", vilket narapå leder till krig.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Oktober 1944. Efter att ha tillerkants krigets forsta officiella ubåtssankning återkallas den tyske ubåtskaptenen Gunter Prien plotsligt från sitt patrulluppdrag. Han erbjuds ett hemligt uppdrag: att slå till mot brittiska Royal Navy hemmahamnen i Scapa Flow. Prien lyckas trotsa starka strommar och undgå blockadskeppen, men det garanterar inte att han kan ta sig hem igen efter sitt uppdrag.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Svartskagg; holjt i myter och intriger, ett namn synonymt med kaos. Hans stulna flaggskepp Queen Annes Revenge kryssar genom Karibien och får fart med en brokig besattning av pirater som soker jamlikhet, aventyr och skatter. Nar han lyckas blockera Charleston i South Carolina och kraver medicin till sin syfilissjuka besattning slutar jakten på Svartskagg med en blodig strid.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Utredarna soker genom vraket efter Turkish Air flight 1951 for att ta reda på varfor planet stortade.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Den 17 juli 2007: TAM Airlines Flight 054 ar på inflygning till Sao Paulos okanda Congonhas Airport. Landningsbana 35-L i Congonhas ar en av varldens mest forradiska. Den ar byggd på en kulle omgiven av hoga byggnader. Besattningen på Flight 3054 får en rapport om att banan ar våt och hal. Kapten Henrique Stephanini tar ner sin Airbus A320 vid banans borjan, aktiverar reversering och anvander bromsarna, men planet saktar inte ner. Det rusar nerfor banan, korsar en motorvag och stortar in i en byggnad och en bensinstation i narheten. Ingen på planet overlever. 12 personer på marken dodas också. Detta ar den varsta flygkatastrofen i Sydamerikas historia. Utredarna ar under enorm press for att undersoka vad som gick fel på en av Brasiliens mest trafikerade banor, innan den kraver fler liv.

programme.title: Egyptens solkung: Hemligheter och skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer upptacker att den forsta graven innehåller en kropp sedan Tutankhamon. Mumierna visar sig vara en prinsessa och en adelskvinna, samt ytterligare 30 mumier. Gradvis hittar man svaren på vilka de var och varfor de befinner sig har. Vilka var de då? Att losa pusslet kraver timmar av detektivarbete och den senaste tekniken for att pussla samman dessa mystiska gravars fantastiska bakgrund.

programme.title: Kinas dolda massgrav
programme.desc: Upptack hemligheterna som omsluter Kinas forsta kejsares grav dar Terrakottaarmen vaktar kusliga fynd som skriver om historien.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett postflyg stortar i Lapplandsfjallen. I takt med att haveriutredarna fogar samman pusselbitarna uppenbarar sig en mork och skrammande bild av kaos och forvirring.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter en rutinlandning skakas ett taiwanesiskt plan av en kraftig explosion. Hela flygplanskroppen tillintetgors i eldinfernot. Den internationella haverigruppen hittar inga spår av en bomb ombord men efter en grundlig undersokning av de utbranda resterna visar det sig att ingredienserna till katastrofen låg dolda i ett forvaringsfack.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Ännu en karv vinter lider mot sitt slut och raddningsarbetarna åker upp till bergen for att återuppleva några av sasongens mest vågade uppdrag.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord riskerar livet for att hålla vagarna oppna nar en vinterstorm slår till. Jo Roger och hans son Ole Henrik tvingas hantera enorma mangder sno.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Blixtar orsakar kaos i byggnader nar de slår ner. Över hela varlden sjunker stader av olika anledningar och torn kollapsar. En tunnelbanevagn i Mexico City och flera broar i Indien rasar. I Dallas blir en olycklig rivning en kopia av det lutande tornet i Pisa och en sensation på sociala medier. Vanliga manniskor visar upp sina MacGyver-fardigheter, vilket vacker frågan: geniala eller galna?

programme.title: Inside Airport Lost and Found
programme.desc: Folj farden med de forlorade prylarna, från att återforenas på Seattles flygplats till att bli återtagna på Unclaimed Baggage Center eller utauktionerade på Pittsburghs flygplats.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: På Australiens mest trafikerade flygplats, som ar i drift dygnet runt, stoppar ett stromavbrott all verksamhet och resursansvarige Andrew forsoker återstalla strommen inom en timme. Flygledaren Melissa hanterar upp till 700 flygningar per dag. Ett flyg måste tomma sin bransletank och återvanda till flygplatsen efter start på grund av ett fel på motorn.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Nar Alaska Airlines Flight 261 plotsligt kraschar ner I Stilla havet finner utredarna ett kritiskt underhållsproblem med dodliga konsekvenser.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Curly får hora att ett stort trad riskerar att falla på ett hus i området. Mary ger sig ut på en outtrottlig jakt efter brasved.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Mary drar till skogs for att jaga svartbjorn for forsta gången. Gary forsoker fånga en baver. Hans och Timbi går upp i bergen for att samla ved.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer graver ut den outforskade gravkammaren i en gammal pyramid i hopp om att hitta den 4 400 år gamla kungens mumie och hans skatter. Ingen modern arkeolog har till fullo utforskat Sahurepyramiden som har drabbats av en katastrofal kollaps inuti. Dr Mohamed Ismail Khaled och hans team tar sig an den farliga uppgiften att roja undan rasmassorna och gor upptackter for livet.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer jagar ledtrådar som kan kasta ljus over livet och doden i det forna Egyptens forlorade megastad – Alexandria. De upptacker en krock mellan civilisationer nar de graver upp ett enormt hus for de doda. I stadens utkanter bryter de sig in i en intakt grav for att lara sig hur vanliga invånare behandlade sina doda nar Egyptens sista faraoner byggde sin praktfulla huvudstad.

programme.title: Slave av Danmark
programme.desc: På St. Croix risikerer Regina livet for en abort. Danmarks største slaveeier er blant landets rikeste, men taper penger på at slaver rømmer eller dør.

programme.title: Ville fristelser
programme.desc: Gjengen gjenforenes etter å ha vært delt i to dager. Deltagerne møter den største fristelsen til nå, og Mona truer med å bruke opp alle pengene.

programme.title: Geniet Shakespeare
programme.desc: Shakespeares familie henges ut som katolikker, og dermed forrædere. Selv skriver han sitt mest episke og tragiske verk.

programme.title: Portrettmesterskapet
programme.desc: Åtte kunstnere kjemper om fire finaleplasser, men får en utfordring når modellene Else Kåss Furuseth og Abid Raja snakker om kapp.

programme.title: Året var 1973
programme.desc: Gisseldramaet som gjev opphav til omgrepet «stockholmsyndromet» skakar Sverige. Landet får ein ny konge, mens militæret tar makta frå Allende i Chile.

programme.title: NRK Musikk - låt for låt
programme.desc: I snart 50 år har Jan Eggum levert låter som har truffet midt i den norske folkesjela. Her er noen av dem.

programme.title: Elgen
programme.desc: Vi går i fotspora til elgen slik han i tusenår har vore ein del av det samiske livet. Ei kjelde til mat, handverk, myter og åndelegheit.

programme.title: Familien Nerdrum
programme.desc: Odd søker på Høstutstillingen og er spent på om han kommer med. Han inviterer også samtidskunstner Bjarne Melgaard til et besøk på gården.

programme.title: KORK - hele landets orkester
programme.desc: Tre herrer som ikke behøver noen presentasjon, men det er ikke hverdagskost å slå seg sammen med Hele landets orkester til stor konsert i Moss.

programme.title: Nytt blod
programme.desc: Tusen ting må på plass før sommeren. Tuva kjører på med store prosjekt. Marie og Nils protesterer, de mener planene er urealistiske.

programme.title: Norges tøffeste
programme.desc: Gjengen har virkelig funnet tonen, og alle tar vare på hverandre. Likevel er det noen som legger egne planer ved bålet.

programme.title: Singelgåten
programme.desc: Det har vært ubehagets år, og det er på tide å se om all innsatsen har gitt resultater.

programme.title: Runoja - Festkonsert på Finnskogen
programme.desc: I oktober 2025 åpnes Skogfinsk museum. Kork og Sinikka Langeland med flere besøkte Svullrya på Finnskogen for å feire skogfinsk kultur og musikk.

programme.title: Humoretaten
programme.desc: Uventet flørt, Karpe på tysk morgenshow, Simen Velles «manbun» og onkel Arvid med filmtips.

programme.title: Ville fristelser
programme.desc: Gjengen gjenforenes etter å ha vært delt i to dager. Deltagerne møter den største fristelsen til nå, og Mona truer med å bruke opp alle pengene.

programme.title: Nytt på nytt
programme.desc: En satiredrone som krenker ditt luftrom i en halvtimes tid, for så å sette over til Kveldsnytt. Med «Humoretaten»-Mathea og «teknologiekspert»-Torgeir

programme.title: Jakten på monstermakrellen
programme.desc: Med «Lyren» til rors, får Bård og Lars størjen på kroken. Men har de det som skal til for å lande den?

programme.title: Sørstatene med Griff
programme.desc: Elva Tennessee leverer vannkraft til industrien i Chattanooga. Derfra reiser Griff til Nashville for å oppleve byens legendariske musikkliv.

programme.title: Klassiske opplevelser
programme.desc: Amalie Stalheim gyver løs på Haydns cellokonsert i D-dur med friskt mot og nyskrevet kadens.

programme.title: Klassiske opplevelser
programme.desc: Det skulle ta år før Johan Halvorsen skrev sin skjebnesymfoni, Fatum. Et rikt komponistliv ligger i musikken Kork spiller. Dirigent: Patrik Ringborg.

programme.title: Vakre og ville Oman
programme.desc: Karakalar, kameleonar og åtselgribbar – vindane som nærer Omans landskap gjev også grunnlag for ein eineståande og mangfaldig fauna.

programme.title: So Long, Marianne
programme.desc: Leonard sikrer seg platekontrakt, men stoffmisbruket fortsetter. Marianne drar til New York for å hjelpe ham.

programme.title: Slave av Danmark
programme.desc: På St. Croix risikerer Regina livet for en abort. Danmarks største slaveeier er blant landets rikeste, men taper penger på at slaver rømmer eller dør.

programme.title: Nedgravde hemmeligheter
programme.desc: Teamet oppdager at drapsofferet hadde nasjonalistiske holdninger, voldelige tendenser og hemmelige forhold.

programme.title: Norges tøffeste
programme.desc: Gjengen har virkelig funnet tonen, og alle tar vare på hverandre. Likevel er det noen som legger egne planer ved bålet.

programme.title: Folkefest på Slottsplassen
programme.desc: Sensommermagi med Oslo-Filharmonien, fiolinvirtuos Ragnhild Hemsing, og sangfenomenet Jasmin White. Programledere Tarjei Strøm og Adelina Ibishi.

programme.title: Ukjent arving: Sverige
programme.desc: Mark reiser til Bulgaria for å leite etter nokon som skal få ein svimlande sum etter velgjeraren Simeon Genov.

programme.title: Sprek med Sofia
programme.desc: Ja, takk – begge deler!

programme.title: Med hjartet på rette staden
programme.desc: Ein gammal rival av Ventress er komen tilbake til Aidensfield saman med kona si. Vernon organiserer missekonkurransen "Frøken Aidensfield".

programme.title: Det gode bondeliv
programme.desc: Den gamle brakka skal bort. Det gir nye muligheter – og bedre utsikt. Rødbetene skal opp, men avlingen er dårlig. Til gjengjeld er søtpotetene enorme.

programme.title: Det gode bondeliv
programme.desc: Frank har mistet yndlingsanorakken sin, så nå vil han sy en ny – i nøye utvalgt stoff. Mens han rengjør brostein, dukker det opp ei mystisk renne.

programme.title: Side om Side
programme.desc: Jonas får ny stilling på Granli skole, men får en sjalusibombe i fanget. Lisbeth og Frode blir invadert av en våryr Britt, og Celine sliter med å få datteren sin til å smile. Heldigvis for henne får hun hjelp av Silje og Gullestad.

programme.title: Sprek med Sofia
programme.desc: Ja, takk – begge deler!

programme.title: Beat for Beat
programme.desc: Artistene som skal konkurrere er Lollo Gardmann og Kirsti Lucena Medalle Andersen mot Ole Morten Aagenæs og Jon Niklas Rønning. Programleder er Atle Pettersen.

programme.title: Det sit i veggane
programme.desc: Ein gammal skule i Vaxholm er gjort om til bustad. Huset rommar mange spennande historier.

programme.title: Interiørarkitektens svenske hjem
programme.desc: Interiørarkitekt, kunstner og scenograf Streijffert elsker tak. Bli med til hennes fantastiske loft med utsikt over Stockholm.

programme.title: Monsen, Monsen og Mattis
programme.desc: Gutta har lenge drømt om Nordland på langs, men vil starte på sjøen. Derfor prøver de noe de ikke har gjort før; å starte i hver sin lille seilbåt.

programme.title: Monsen, Monsen og Mattis
programme.desc: Det gode livet på sjøen fortsetter, selv om det pene været er i ferd med å forsinke hele ekspedisjonen. Men vi skal snart få væromslag.

programme.title: Bakemesterskapet
programme.desc: Brød og sirkus! Og Afrika og tivoli og Finse. Alt kan være inspirasjon når et byggverk skal reises – av brød.

programme.title: Stoltenberg i møte med krigen
programme.desc: Krigen i Ukraina raser, og NATO-sjef Stoltenberg lover Zelenskyj å stå ved Ukraina så lenge det kreves. Samtidig lover han kona, Ingrid, å komme hjem.

programme.title: Munter mat
programme.desc: Det blir terriner og pateer i ulike former fra brødrene Prices hånd denne gangen: Fransk landpate, dansk terrine av svineskank med karamellisert sjalottløk og 70-tallsklassikeren lakseterrine.

programme.title: Med hjartet på rette staden
programme.desc: Ein gammal rival av Ventress er komen tilbake til Aidensfield saman med kona si. Vernon organiserer missekonkurransen "Frøken Aidensfield".

programme.title: Hygge i hagen
programme.desc: Pernilla drøymer stort for den nye garden, men John kjem kjapt i gang med dyrkinga. Tareq finn etelege urtar, og Malin bygger takvindauge.

programme.title: Det sit i veggane
programme.desc: Ein gammal skule i Vaxholm er gjort om til bustad. Huset rommar mange spennande historier.

programme.title: Med hjartet på rette staden
programme.desc: Ein gammal rival av Ventress er komen tilbake til Aidensfield saman med kona si. Vernon organiserer missekonkurransen "Frøken Aidensfield".

programme.title: Amanda og Alans italienske rønne
programme.desc: Amanda bringer et lite stykke Hollywood til Sicilia når hun pusser opp hovedsoverommet.

programme.title: Ville familier
programme.desc: Om du er veps i England, gepard i Kenya eller guanaco i Patagonia – åpne sletter byr på både utfordringer og muligheter for den som vil fø opp unger.

programme.title: Afrika med Afua
programme.desc: I Kenya møter Afua et forholdsvis ungt land med både stor urban utbygging og mye uberørt utmark.

programme.title: Etter Benjamin
programme.desc: Det er sommer på Holmlia, og bestekompisene Benjamin og Elias drømmer om alt livet kan by på. Et halvt år senere blir alle drømmer knust.

programme.title: Etter Benjamin
programme.desc: Benjamins død sender sjokkbølger gjennom Holmlia. Hjemme sitter en knust mor, mens ungdommene samles i sinne og sorg. Alle unntatt Elias.

programme.title: Sau
programme.desc: Sommeren er i gang. Sauene skal til fjells og slåttonna står for tur. Og midt i alt arbeidet rømmer både biene og sauene.

programme.title: Låtskrivern
programme.desc: Intimkonsert fra Rockheim i Trondheim med den folkekjære artisten og låtskriveren Ole Paus. Programleder er Tor Andersen.

programme.title: Ukjent arving: Sverige
programme.desc: Kattis frys i Canada, men blir varm i hjartet når ho ser kven som skal få arva til estlendaren Raimond Pohlak.

programme.title: Helt Ramme sporter
programme.desc: 42 km løping - 23 glass rødvin. Hvem sjangler først i mål - Nicolay eller Emilie Voe Nereng?

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma spiller frisbeegolf med brødrene før hun skal på scenen på Palmesus. Men først må hun mestre et vanskelig dansetrinn. Rekker hun det før showet?

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Livet er hektisk når du vil satse som artist ved siden av skole, trening og familieliv. Med støtte fra hunden Tico og fansen gir Emma alt på konsert.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma har bursdag, og feirer på skoletur i London. Mamma er med på turen, men hun er ikke den beste storbyguiden akkurat.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma blir helt satt ut når hun møter et idol på rød løper under en prisutdeling. Men hun dropper showet – hun vil heller spise pizza hos tante!

programme.title: Ville fristelser
programme.desc: Gjengen gjenforenes etter å ha vært delt i to dager. Deltagerne møter den største fristelsen til nå, og Mona truer med å bruke opp alle pengene.

programme.title: Skeiv sommar
programme.desc: Til ein solfylt idyll i Alberta, Canada kjem unge skeive, ikkje-binære og transfolk for å vere med på sommarleir og berre vere tenåringar.

programme.title: Familien Nerdrum
programme.desc: Odd søker på Høstutstillingen og er spent på om han kommer med. Han inviterer også samtidskunstner Bjarne Melgaard til et besøk på gården.

programme.desc: Det har vært ubehagets år, og det er på tide å se om all innsatsen har gitt resultater.

Doug is disappointed by her new appointment because this means that they wont be spending any time together, but then decides to use her time away as an opportunity to do whatever he wants – eat in bed, not brush his teeth before he goes to sleep, etc. Unfortunately, he starts to get a little lonely but soon discovers that Arthur makes a suitable companion to keep him company.
